SELECT COUNT(*) AS current_streak FROM ( SELECT signin_date, DATE_SUB(signin_date, INTERVAL ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY signin_date DESC) DAY) AS grp FROM tb_user_signin WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND signin_date <= CURDATE() ) AS grouped WHERE grp = ( SELECT grp FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB(signin_date, INTERVAL ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY signin_date DESC) DAY) AS grp FROM tb_user_signin WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND signin_date <= CURDATE() ORDER BY signin_date DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS latest )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_user_signin WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_signin (user_id, signin_date) VALUES (#{userId}, CURDATE()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name,u.createtime, im.img_path,im.img_name, i.user_sex,d.dic_name user_sex_name,i.user_grjj,i.user_points, s.user_status,d1.dic_name user_status_name,s.status_time FROM tb_user u left join tb_user_img im on u.user_id = im.user_id and im.img_type = '10001' left join tb_user_info i on u.user_id = i.user_id left join tb_dictionary d on d.dic_id = i.user_sex left join tb_user_status s on u.user_id = s.user_id left join tb_dictionary d1 on d1.dic_id = s.user_status where u.user_id = #{userId}

mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS username, COALESCE(ui.img_path, '') AS avatar, COALESCE(consecutive_days.streak, 0) AS consecutiveDays, COALESCE(total_days.total, 0) AS totalSignInDays, COALESCE(info.user_points, '0') AS totalPoints FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_user_img ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id AND ui.img_type = '10001' LEFT JOIN tb_user_info info ON u.user_id = info.user_id LEFT JOIN ( -- ✅ 修正后的连续签到计算 WITH cte AS ( SELECT user_id, signin_date, DATE_SUB( signin_date, INTERVAL ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY signin_date ASC) - 1 DAY ) AS grp FROM tb_user_signin WHERE signin_date <= CURDATE() ), latest_date AS ( SELECT user_id, MAX(signin_date) AS last_signin FROM tb_user_signin WHERE signin_date <= CURDATE() GROUP BY user_id ), current_grp AS ( SELECT c.user_id, c.grp FROM cte c INNER JOIN latest_date l ON c.user_id = l.user_id AND c.signin_date = l.last_signin ) SELECT c.user_id, COUNT(*) AS streak FROM cte c INNER JOIN current_grp g ON c.user_id = g.user_id AND c.grp = g.grp GROUP BY c.user_id ) consecutive_days ON u.user_id = consecutive_days.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total FROM tb_user_signin GROUP BY user_id ) total_days ON u.user_id = total_days.user_id WHERE consecutive_days.streak > 0 OR total_days.total > 0 ORDER BY consecutive_days.streak DESC, total_days.total DESC, CAST(info.user_points AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT #{limit}
